languages.text: {n}Боль рассекает лицо старика провалом беззубого рта, и в изъеденных временем глазах назревают соленые слезы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Боль рассекает лицо старика провалом беззубого рта, и в изъеденных временем глазах назревают соленые слезы.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Боль рассекает лицо старика провалом беззубого рта, и в изъеденных временем глазах назревают соленые слезы.{/n}

traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}老人痛苦地张开了没有牙齿的嘴巴。他的脸似乎要裂成两半，饱经风霜的双眼中涌出了苦涩的泪水。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老人痛苦地张开了没有牙齿的嘴巴。他的脸似乎要裂成两半，饱经风霜的双眼中涌出了苦涩的泪水。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}La boca desdentada del anciano se abre con dolor, lo que hace parecer que su cara se parte en dos, y lágrimas punzantes se acumulan en sus ojos cansados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La boca desdentada del anciano se abre con dolor, lo que hace parecer que su cara se parte en dos, y lágrimas punzantes se acumulan en sus ojos cansados.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}顔がふたつに裂けたかのように、老人の歯のない口が苦しみで開き、使い古された瞳から塩気のある涙があふれ出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}顔がふたつに裂けたかのように、老人の歯のない口が苦しみで開き、使い古された瞳から塩気のある涙があふれ出す。{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Le visage du vieil homme semble se fendre en deux alors que sa bouche édentée s'ouvre sous l'effet de la douleur et que des larmes amères perlent à ses yeux fatigués.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage du vieil homme semble se fendre en deux alors que sa bouche édentée s'ouvre sous l'effet de la douleur et que des larmes amères perlent à ses yeux fatigués.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}Der zahnlose Mund des alten Mannes öffnet sich voller Schmerzen, als würde sein Gesicht in zwei Teile gespalten, und in seinen erschöpften Augen steigen salzige Tränen auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der zahnlose Mund des alten Mannes öffnet sich voller Schmerzen, als würde sein Gesicht in zwei Teile gespalten, und in seinen erschöpften Augen steigen salzige Tränen auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}İhtiyarın dişsiz ağzı, yüzünü ikiye bölercesine acı içinde açılıyor; yıpranmış gözlerinden tuzlu gözyaşları akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's toothless mouth opens in pain, seemingly splitting his face in two, and his salty tears well in his time-worn eyes.{/n}
